messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant with access to tools.
First list the current directory, then read the package.json file and tell me what the name is

function.name: bash
function.description: Executes shell commands like ls, git, npm, docker, curl, etc. in a bash terminal.

function.name: read
function.description: Reads a file from the local filesystem

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to read
